author: Simon Carswell
title: Coronavirus: HSE braces for possible peak of Covid-19 cases in mid-April
description: The HSE is preparing for a surge of coronavirus cases with 1,200 critical care beds but is unsure by how much the State’s intensive care unit (ICU) capacity will be exceeded when the pandemic peaks here. The State’s highest-ranking healthcare officials, at a …
content:
The HSE is preparing for a surge of coronavirus cases with 1,200 critical care beds but is unsure by how much the States intensive care unit (ICU) capacity will be exceeded when the pandemic peaks here.
